mine_unit_path.description: [unit]Path to the mine unit that should be thrown.

on_mine_triggered_sound_event.description: [wwise]The sound to play on the mine when it's is triggered.

chain_reaction_time.description: Time from explosion near by to self explosion.

chain_reaction_size.description: If non-zero exploding mines trigger other mines in this radius.

arm_time.description: Time over which the mines arm themselves (re-align to ground).

explosion_type.description: Explosion type to use when exploding. See explosion_settings.h.

ai_avoidance_radius.description: The radius size of obstacle spheres placed on mines for the AI avoidance. If 0 no AI avoidance is used.

agent_type.description: [string]The agent type to use for this obstacle generator. Agent types are specified in global.havok_ai_properties.

trigger_on_touch.description: [bool]The mines will trigger on touch instead of the default, when stepping off it.
